typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	movieName as string
}
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> sourceSQLDatabase
sourceSQLDatabase alterRow(deleteIf(title == $movieName)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer,
		dateOfETL as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['movie'],
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> deleteRows
